body.p: The Board agreed with these arguments and decided to require retrospective application of the exception to consolidation, subject to specific transition reliefs, such as:

li.p: a relief for when it is impracticable to identify the fair value of investments;
a relief for when an investment entity disposes of investments prior to the date of initial application; and
a relief from providing comparative information for more than one period preceding the date of initial application.
